languages.text: "Госпожа Версериан, где Ахиллеас Скаландр? Я ожидал увидеть его здесь, рядом с вами".
"Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Версериан, где Ахиллеас Скаландр? Я ожидал увидеть его здесь, рядом с вами".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「レディ・ウェルセリアン、アキレアス・スカランダーはどこだ？お前の側にいるものと思っていたが」
languages.original_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・ウェルセリアン、アキレアス・スカランダーはどこだ？お前の側にいるものと思っていたが」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “韦尔森女士，阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德在什么地方？我刚刚好像看到他就在你身边。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森女士，阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德在什么地方？我刚刚好像看到他就在你身边。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Lady Werserian, ¿dónde está Achilleas Scalander? Pensaba que estaría aquí, a su lado».
languages.original_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Werserian, ¿dónde está Achilleas Scalander? Pensaba que estaría aquí, a su lado».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Dame Werserian, où est Achilleas Scalander ? Je pensais le trouver ici, à vos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Werserian, où est Achilleas Scalander ? Je pensais le trouver ici, à vos côtés. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Lady Werserian, wo ist Achilleas Scalander? Ich dachte, ich würde ihn hier an Eurer Seite finden."
languages.original_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Werserian, wo ist Achilleas Scalander? Ich dachte, ich würde ihn hier an Eurer Seite finden."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Leydi Werserian, Achilleas Scalander nerede? Onu sizinle birlikte görmeyi bekliyordum."
languages.original_text: "Lady Werserian, where is Achilleas Scalander? I thought I'd see him here, by your side."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Werserian, Achilleas Scalander nerede? Onu sizin yanınızda görmeyi bekliyordum."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
